name: Beetle Arena
description:
Beetle Arena is a survival game. If you like shooting and action games like Battle Royale games, this game is for you! Beetle Arena is a casual arena fighting game in which you destroy your ennemies as a beetle! During 5-10 minutes games, face your enemies in intense battles. To play you only have to start a game, shoot the enemies and survive!

Controls

Simply move your character around with your mouse and click on the ennemies to shoot at them.

Games features
  • Weapons

Shoot the enemies with the weapons of your choice: machine guns, rifles or even shotguns. You can also use grenades and missile to punch your ennemies.

  • Graphics

3D graphics and unique characters: fight with beetles and stand out with your gameplay!

  • Map

Fight your enemies on a gigantic battlefield, but beware, the battleground shrinks over time, keep moving!

  • Strategy

Develop an attack strategy by taking into account the different elements of the game: bush allows you to hide, but water zones slow you down!

  • Fast match-making

Ultra-fast match creation, as soon as you die, you can restart a new game right away.

  • Free app

The application is completely free, play without any limit!

Your support is really important for us so feel free to leave a comment!
